doStartTag

               throws JspException

doStartTag in interface Tag

doAfterBody

public int doAfterBody()
                throws JspException
Two things need to be accomplished here. First, need to iterate once over the columns to load up all the attributes. Second, need to iterate over the columns as many times as specified by the rowsDisplayed attribute so the columns row can be resolved. On each iteration over the columns the current bean in the collection is passed via the pageScope.

Specified by:
doAfterBody in interface IterationTag
Throws:
JspException
